DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if two test products are safe and effective in the treatment of seborrheic dermatitis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study in Subjects With Seborrheic Dermatitis
DOC.criteria: Investigator assessment of seborrheic dermatitis. Additional criteria as identified in the protocol. History of or ongoing psoriasis of the scalp. History of or ongoing atopic dermatitis of the scalp. Additional criteria as identified in the protocol.
